name: Only A Lab Slime
description:
Note: The browser game is a demo. It is supposed to give you a quick feel of the first 5 levels of the game while you DOWNLOAD 25+ LEVELS BELOW! 

You are the product of an experiment gone wrong. You seem to be self aware. You want to explore. You want to be free. Not everyone will allow this. Your freedom, must come at a cost. You must smash, bash and dash your way to freedom. What are you waiting for? The slime must be free!

Jupiter Hadley plays Only A Lab Slime

Good luck and have fun! I update this game as much as I can with new content and levels, so check out the devlog below to see the latest and future changes. Feedback in the comments are greatly appreciated.
